title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: The bug report does not provide information about the observed behavior.
EB: The dynamic text item should display the datetime value in the same format as the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a text item.
2. Insert a data item.
3. Insert a dynamic text item.
4. Save and preview the page.
5. Verify that the datetime values shown in all three items are not in the same format.
